snippet.title: Crash Bandicoot 4 N.Hanced Mod - Version 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Download from
GameBanana:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/527056
NexusMods (YT truncates the link, please remove spaces):
https://www.nexusmods.com/  crashbandicoot4itsabouttime/mods/194

This mod for Crash 4 is a thorough revamp of the completion system, collectibles, and level designs, including removing N.Verted mode, toned down hidden crates, improved crate puzzles, new relic times and quality of life improvements.

Version 2 further overhauls the level designs for better flow and a more challenging Retro mode, redesigns Flashback levels to be more interesting, upgrades the triple spin and reduces frustrating elements in time trials, introduces a purple gem path and lots of quality of life improvements.

More details can be found on the mod page.
